mapper.sql: a.prp_sn AS "prpSn", a.gname AS "gname", a.saleno AS "saleno", a.factno AS "factno", a.purchase_price AS "purchasePrice", a.threshold AS "threshold", a.purchase_cycle AS "purchaseCycle", a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"

mapper.update: UPDATE oil_stock_situa SET prp_sn = #{prpSn}, gname = #{gname}, saleno = #{saleno}, factno = #{factno}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice}, threshold = #{threshold}, purchase_cycle = #{purchaseCycle}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
